Version.Changes:
21/12/2014: Added fix for Dragon Age Inquisition (Helifax)
 - 20/11/2014: Updated fix for The Evil Within
 - 20/11/2014: Updated fix for Middle Earth: Shadow Of Mordor
 - 20/10/2014: Added fix for Alien Isolation (Helifax)
 - 18/10/2014: Forgot to set 64bit flag on some of the fixes
 - 18/10/2014: Updated fix for Middle Earth: Shadow of Mordor
 - 17/10/2014: Added fix for The Evil Within
 - 13/10/2014: Added fix for Ryse: Son Of Rome (Helifax)
 - 04/10/2014: Updated fix for Middle Earth: Shadow Of Mordor
 - 02/10/2014: Added fix for Middle Earth: Shadow Of Mordor
 - 30/09/2014: Updated fix for Dark Souls II
 - 30/09/2014: Updated fix for Fable Anniversary
 - 27/09/2014: Updated fix for The Vanishing of Ethan Carter - added Helifax's HUDFix
 - 27/09/2014: Added new plugin for The Vanishing of Ethan Carter.
 - 27/09/2014: Added new plugin for Sanctum (original).
 - 27/09/2014: Added new plugin for Orcs Must Die: Unchained.
 - 13/09/2014: Added new plugin for Lost Planet 3.
 - 13/09/2014: Added new plugin for Fable Anniversary.
 - 11/09/2014: Fixed some bugs with the Dead Rising 3 plugin.
 - 11/09/2014: Updated Diablo 3 fix.
 - 07/09/2014: Fixed poor performance in Dead Rising 3 with high resolutions.
 - 06/09/2014: Added fix for Dead Rising 3 (partially fixed).
 - 06/09/2014: Updated fix for Battlefield 4.
 - 28/06/2014: Updated fix for COD Ghosts - mem protect changed.
 - 13/06/2014: Added fix for Murdered: Soul Suspect - fixes FOV, and attempts to fix HUD.
 - 03/06/2014: Updated fix for Wolfenstein - movies are now fixed.
 - 03/06/2014: Added fix for Viscera Cleanup Detail: SW - fixes weapons and ingame FOV
 - 31/05/2014: Updated Call Of Duty: Ghosts - They changed EXE protect, breaking scanning.
 - 28/05/2014: Added fix for Watch_Dogs - fixes issues with the FOV
 - 25/05/2014: Added fix for YAIBA: Ninja Gaiden Z - fixes the FOV and HUD.
 - 24/05/2014: Added fix for Child Of Light - fixes the FOV and HUD.
 - 24/05/2014: Added fix for Killer Is Dead - fixes the FOV and HUD.
 - 20/05/2014: Added fix for Wolfenstein: The New Order - fixes aspect ratio.
 - 28/04/2014: Added fix for The Amazing Spiderman 2 fix - fixes HUD and letterboxing.
 - 28/04/2014: Updated Dark Souls II fix - Dark Souls II is now VAC secured.
 - 27/04/2014: Updated Dark Souls II fix - fixed hit damage text and party name.
 - 26/04/2014: Updated Dark Souls II fix - targeting reticle now visible, Bonfire text now visible.
 - 26/04/2014: Added fix Dark Souls II - fixes HUD, Letterboxing and windowed resolution.
 - 12/04/2014: Fixed a couple of issues with Modern Warefare 3..
 - 09/03/2014: Added fix for Metal Gear Rising, fixes HUD, aspect ratio and resolution limit.
 - 08/03/2014: Added FOV slider to Resident Evil 4 plugin.
 - 07/03/2014: Fixed error with South Park: SOT - should now support 21:9 etc.
 - 06/03/2014: Added fix for South Park: The Stick of Truth, fixes letter boxing.
 - 06/03/2014: StandardBase - Updated process_exename var not being updated when specifying multiple EXEs.
 - 06/03/2014: The Walking Dead - Updated plugin for The Walking Dead, Season 2.
 - 06/03/2014: Diablo III - Updated Diablo III to support Reaper Of Souls.
 - 06/03/2014: The Wolf Among Us - Fixed a bug which may cause issues on toggling fix enabled.
 - 02/03/2014: Added fix for Resident Evil 4 HD, fixes issues with the HUD, Aspect Ratio and FOV.
 - 28/02/2014: Added fix for Castlevania 2: LOS, fixes issues with the HUD and resolution restriction.
 - 16/02/2014: Added fix for Sanctum 2, fixes issues with the FOV and Menus, HUD still spanned.
 - 04/01/2014: Added fix for Bioshock (original), fixes issues with the HUD, menus, FOV
 - 30/11/2013: Added fix for Flashback, fixes issues with the HUD, FOV, letterboxing, aspect ratio and culling.
 - 30/11/2013: Improved Injustice: Gods among us, finishing moves should be correct now, still minor bugs
 - 30/11/2013: Added fix for Assassins Creed IV - fixes letterboxing.
 - 27/11/2013: Added fix for Injustice: Gods Among Us - fixes Aspect Ratio, HUD and FOV.
 - 24/11/2013: Added fix for Need for Speed: Rivals - fixes the FOV.
 - 23/11/2013: Re-added fix for Bioshock 2 now that GFWL has been removed.
 - 20/11/2013: Updated COD Ghosts plugin, Yesterdays fix broke SP.
 - 19/11/2013: Updated COD Ghosts plugin, my MP FOV fix method disabled by Infinity Ward, Use Method 2.
 - 18/11/2013: Fixed a bug in Contrast which results in the HUD being 1 pixel off in 16:10, Thanks to Revy.
 - 18/11/2013: Added Contrast, fixes FOV and HUD and removes letterboxing.
 - 17/11/2013: Changed required architecture on multiple plugins, copy and paste fail.
 - 17/11/2013: Added Alien Rage, fixes weapons FOV and HUD.
 - 17/11/2013: Added Deadfalls Adventure, fixes weapons FOV, game FOV and removes letterboxing.
 - 15/11/2013: Added Silent Hill 3, requested by Marty.
 - 14/11/2013: Updated COD Ghosts to add FOV slider, fixed multiple (minor) bugs in base LUA packages.
 - 13/11/2013: Fixed Dishonored plugin, had broken XML tags.
 - 12/11/2013: Added fix for Battlefield 4
 - 12/11/2013: Added fix for The Wolf Among Us
 - 11/11/2013: Added fix for Call Of Duty: Ghosts
 - 02/08/2013: Added fix for Rise Of The Triad
 - 02/08/2013: Added fix for Sonic Adventure 2
 - 07/07/2013: Added fix for Mortal Kombat: Komplete Edition.
 - 04/07/2013: Added fix for Dark.
 - 30/06/2013: Added fix for Deadpool.
 - 14/06/2013: Added fix for Remember Me.

Module.Author: HaYDeN

SubVersion.Changes: Resident Evil 4 - new plugin, fixes issues with the HUD, Aspect Ratio and FOV.
Castlevania: Lords of Shadow 2 - new plugin, fixes issues with the FOV.
Sanctum 2 - new plugin, fixes issues with the FOV and Menus, HUD still spanned.
Bioshock - new plugin, fixes issues with the FOV and HUD.
Flashback - new plugin, fixes issues with the HUD, menus, FOV, letterboxing, aspect ratio and over zelous culling.
Assassins Creed IV: BlackFlag - new plugin, fixes letterboxing.
Improved Injustice: Gods among us, finishing moves should be correct now, still minor bugs
Need for Speed: Rivals - new plugin, fixes issues with the FOV.
Bioshock 2 - new plugin, fixes issues with the FOV and HUD.
Contrast - new plugin, fixes issues with the FOV and HUD.
Deadfall Adventures - new plugin, fixes issues with the FOV and weapons FOV.
Alien Rage - new plugin, fixes issues with the HUD and weapons FOV.
Silent Hill 3 - new plugin, mainly aimed at 16:9 users rather than multimonitor.
Battlefield 4 - updated, FOV fix for Single player.
The Wolf Among Us - Fixed a bug which may cause issues on toggling fix enabled.
Call Of Duty: Ghosts - They changed EXE protect, breaking scanning.
Rise Of The Triad - new plugin, fixes the issues with the FOV.
Sonic Adventure 2 - new plugin, fixes the issues with the HUD.
Mortal Kombat: Komplete Edition - new plugin, fixes the issues with the FOV.
Dark - new plugin, fixes the issues with the FOV.
Deadpool - new plugin, fixes the issues with the FOV.
Remember Me - new plugin, fixes the issues with the FOV and HUD.
Fixed an issue with the XML for this plugin.
Modern Warfare 3 - fixed a couple of issues.
Updated Diablo III to support latest version
